iPhone 6 plus

screen.width        414
screen.height       736
devicePixelRatio    3


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=414,
        view=full

innerWidth          414
innerHeight         628


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=414,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          414
innerHeight         696


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=1656,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          1656
innerHeight         2785


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=736,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          736
innerHeight         414


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=2944,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          2944
innerHeight         1656
